message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. I'm confident it will be a great investment for your business. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000 for your product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both the value of your product and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,050,000 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,080,000.  This reflects the value of the product to you, and it gives us both a good deal. Let me know if you're interested.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I'm unable to go above $1,070,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price given its value to me. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
